  assert_equals: Check result from DataTransfer in paste event expected "First\\r\\n\\r\\rSecond" but got "First\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\nSecond"

  assert_equals: Check result from DataTransfer in paste event expected "First\\r\\n\\r\\n\\rSecond" but got "First\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\nSecond"
[FAIL] test preformatted text with line breaks: "\\r \\n"
  assert_equals: Check result from DataTransfer in paste event expected "First\\r \\r\\nSecond" but got "First\\r\\n \\r\\nSecond"
